titleStmt.title: The Iesuits miracles, or new popish vvonders Containing the straw, the crowne, and the vvondrous child, with the confutation of them and their follies.
titleStmt.author: Pricket, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Nicholas Okes] for C. P[urset] and R. I[ackson] and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet neere the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: R.P., i.e. Robert Pricket. Variant: "To the reader" unsigned.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet neere the Conduit
